We search we original tweets, allowing for up to 18 thousand. We ran the function at 5 pm on Tuesday November 29th. 
```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
musk <- search_tweets(
  q = "musk Twitter, lang:en",
  n = 18000,
  include_rts = FALSE
)
```
